version_name: 4.3.1• camera and iOS 8 bugfixes and improvementsVersion 4.3New camera:• Take multiple photos and pick the best one when you’re done shooting• Easy access to your library’s most recent photos

version_description: We regularly bring new updates to the App Store, with bug fixes and performance improvements to make EyeEm better for you!
We regularly bring new updates to the App Store, with bug fixes and performance improvements to make EyeEm better for you!

Some of our users were affected by a bug related to the news feed. Since our news feed is kinda cool, this version is fixing that problem. Additionally we’ve fixed an issue with keeping some meta-data of the photo after the image was edited. Have fun shooting!

Upload just got smarter! Here’s what to expect from this update:
With the new EyeEm Selects feature, your app suggests the best photos to upload from your camera roll – all powered by our computer vision technology.
We regularly bring new updates to the App Store, with bug fixes and performance improvements to make EyeEm better for you!
We regularly bring new updates to the App Store, with bug fixes and performance improvements to make EyeEm better for you!
We regularly bring new updates to the App Store, with bug fixes and performance improvements to make EyeEm better for you!
See horizontal shots in all their glory. You can now tap any photo and turn your phone sideways to see the picture in landscape format.
We regularly bring new updates to the App Store, with bug fixes and performance improvements to make EyeEm better for you!
We regularly bring new updates to the App Store, with bug fixes and performance improvements to make EyeEm better for you!
iOS 11 is here and we’ve made some changes under the hood for EyeEm to be faster and easier to use. We also fixed an issue that prevented you from sharing photos on Twitter.

- Support for iPhone X
- Adding location tags to your photos just got easier. With this latest update you can now search for cities and places anywhere in the world and simply add them to your photo during upload

We’ve revamped the photo uploader for you:
- New look: The uploader now feels more at home in iOS 11.
- Smarter tagging: We suggest more tags for you and automatically select the most fitting ones. That means less picking and choosing.
- Easier captioning: Many of you wanted to see your photo when writing a caption. That’s now possible.
- Clear warnings: If your photo is too small to be accepted for EyeEm Market, we’ll let you know during the upload.

We’ve revamped the photo uploader for you:
- New look: The uploader now feels more at home in iOS 11.
- Smarter tagging: We suggest more tags for you and automatically select the most fitting ones. That means less picking and choosing.
- Easier captioning: Many of you wanted to see your photo when writing a caption. That’s now possible.
- Clear warnings: If your photo is too small to be accepted for EyeEm Market, we’ll let you know during the upload.

With our last week's major update a few minor bugs related to the upload flow and location tagging were introduced. With this latest version we've fixed them.
Unfotunately we still have an issue with photo rotation after editing photos. We are currently working on fixing that issue and will release an update withing the next days.

In the last version we’ve introduced a bug that was rotating edited photos. It looked really funny, but from a user perspective it was kinda annoying. This bug is now fixed. We’ve also made a few improvements to the iPhone X experience and removed some issues related to the photo editing mode.
We regularly bring new updates to the App Store, with bug fixes and performance improvements to make EyeEm better for you!
We regularly bring new updates to the App Store, with bug fixes and performance improvements to make EyeEm better for you!

Since the weekend we encountered some major crashes that unfortunately affected many of you. We are very sorry about this.
Good news is, we were able to fix this quickly - just update the app and everything should be working fine again.

Since the weekend we encountered some major crashes that unfortunately affected many of you. We are very sorry about this.
Good news is, we were able to fix this quickly - just update the app and everything should be working fine again.

You might have realised in the photo upload that the app didn't remember your previous setting about the Market toggle ("Add to Market") and it was always turned off when uploading a new photo. This issue is now fixed.
We regularly bring new updates to the App Store, with bug fixes and performance improvements to make EyeEm better for you!
With this new version you can now upload photos directly from the Apple Photos app to EyeEm. Just tap the share button on the photo view and select EyeEm.
We regularly bring new updates to the App Store, with bug fixes and performance improvements to make EyeEm better for you!

Introducing the new native magazine: When you tap an article on the Discover feed it will now open natively in the app. This means faster loading and the ability to like photos or follow users directly from the article page.

Welcome to an all new Discover feed!
Your hub for creativity and inspiration from the EyeEm community
Shiny new look: a completely redesigned look and feel to the entire feed
Refreshed content: See new photographers, curated photo collections and more every time you refresh your feed
Simplified interaction: Access featured photographers, photo collections and EyeEm Magazine articles easier than ever before
Organized Articles: grouped articles from EyeEm Magazine Online based on the topic and category

Introducing mobile multi upload with EyeEm 7.1!

With multi upload now on mobile for the very first time, you can add up to 15 images to your EyeEm Profile in just one click. Simply head to your chosen photo gallery on your mobile, select your favourite photos and share multiple images to EyeEm quickly and easily.

With the new view you can check the description, tags and location for multiple images efficiently. Plus with EyeEm’s auto tagging, uploading your photos is even more simple.

The Highlights:
- Share Multiple images to your EyeEm Profile in one go
- Manage image Descriptions, Tags and Locations more quickly
- Increase your chances of selling by updating your EyeEm Profile more efficiently

Introducing EyeEm’s newest features helping your creativity flow without leaving the app!

Photo Picker is now even easier to use: Now organized into separate tabs and easier to navigate. Selecting your best photos or trying out our suggestions is more simple than ever.
Easy Access to Albums: Use the new albums tab to find your best images without having to scroll through your whole photo gallery
Multiupload via the app: share multiple photos to your EyeEm Profile in one go.
Faster Upload flow: Manage descriptions, image tags, and locations for multiple photos in a single upload session.

Get your photos selling on EyeEm Market and affiliate image partners quicker with Market Keywording!

- Get to Market faster: add necessary metadata to get your images into the buyer’s hands more quickly
- Optimize photo discoverability: ensure buyers find and buy your photos by adding industry recognised keywords

Fast-track photo distribution process with the new Market Keywording tool. Add market relevant information to skip part of the process and get your images onto partners’ sites as soon as possible. Use the new tool to:

- Update your Market Description
- Ensure the location tag is relevant for buyers
- Add keywords that fall into our ‘controlled vocabulary’

- Ensure the location tag is relevant for buyers
- Add keywords that fall into our ‘controlled vocabulary’
